description: A Devil Fruit that turns the user's body into rubber, granting them immunity to blunt attacks and electricity while allowing them to stretch their body at will.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Tate
abilities.description: Luffy grabs his fingers with his other hand and stretches them before his face to create a shield that blocks blade attacks passing between the fingers.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Ami
abilities.description: Luffy entwines his fingers making a net-like shape and stretches them out to create a larger net to trap opponents.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Vulnerability to cutting and piercing attacks
notes: Two new techniques (Gomu Gomu no Tate and Gomu Gomu no Ami) were revealed in this episode during Luffy's battle with Arlong.
